title: *- NO FEE! - TRUE 2 BED 2 BATH - WASHER DRYER IN UNIT - PRIVATE ROOF
posting_body: ['**-- NO FEE! --', 'TRUE 2 BEDROOM 2 BATHROOM --WASHER DRYER IN UNIT -- ROOFTOP DECK -- EXPOSED BRICK**', 'Listing ID #: 212846', 'Price: $5,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Brownstone', 'Diplomats OK', 'Subway', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'NO FEE', 'Outdoor Space', 'Private Deck', 'Renovated', 'Washer', 'A TRUE 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom in the East Village encompasses everything you need for NYC living.', 'Available for September 1 occupancy, this renovated unit boasts updated modern appliances and finishes.', '- Stainless steel appliances ( washer / dryer / dishwasher ) - Exposed brick - Marble Kitchen/Bathroom - High ceilings', 'Pets Ok!', 'Guarantors Ok!', 'Students Ok!', 'Located in the heart of the East Village, it is central to major transportation including M15,M14A,M14D,F,J,R,N,L,4,5,6, and many more!', 'Within walking distance to Tompkins Square Park!', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
